properties.vacuous-pass: After an assert(false), when the state is unreachable, the prover finds a violation.
properties.vacuous-pass-vacuity-check: After an assert(false), when the state is unreachable, the prover finds a violation.
properties.correct-violation: After an assert(false), when the state is reachable, the prover finds a violation.
properties.correct-pass: After an assert(true), when the state is reachable, the prover finds no violation.
